title: Universal Music
description: Composed and created specially for video and mobile games, production cues, TV and multimedia projects, ESM Team's Universal Music is a one of a kind, ultra high value, all royalty free production music library.
longDescription:
Video: <a href="https://soundcloud.com/epic-sounds-and-fx/universal-music-demo">https://soundcloud.com/epic-sounds-and-fx/universal-music-demo</>

No need to be concerned about track sheets or any accounting nonsense, just browse, preview and then publish your production using this custom stockpile of imaginative music. With more than 450 tracks and loops the Universal Music compilation is an unbelievable value and an indispensable asset for setting the tone in your audio sweeting projects. 
	• 450+ tracks 
	• 4.67 GB 
	• A Vast Variety of Royalty Free Music Tracks/Loops for Games, Production and TV 
	• Production Music Library 
	• Unbelievable Value 
	• Background and Game Lobby Loops 
	• Complementary Cues and Collections 
	• HD Modern Tracks 
	• More than 20 different genres and styles 
	• Different Variations of each track – Full, Minimal 
	• Royalty Free! 
	• Youtube Friendly 
	• Not Involved with AdRev
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 454

Number of Audio Cues: 454

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

List of included tracks: PDF

Does music\audio loop: No

How many sound FX: 454

How many minutes of audio provided: 412 minutes
